column6: When Norman Osborn takes over, what happens to the villains who don't make his short list of acceptable allies?  Grim Reaper, Mr. Hyde, Absorbing Man, Nekra, and Man-Ape are about to find out when their cooperative of crime lands on the wrong side of Norman's law - but they're not going down without a fight. Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | inker:John Dokes | colorist:Tommy Lee Edwards | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Frank Tieri
